attributes.action: Dismiss those members of the Foreign Office Including Ministers, who ordered the non-wearing of poppies at state banquets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The wearing of poppies has been banned at state banquets by the foreign office as it may offend ambasadors. I as an ex-serviceman feel deeply offended, so much so that I call on all members and ex-members of Her Majesty's Armed Forces to write to their MP's and demand the resignation of the present Forign Secretary of State, who will have the afrontary to lay a wreath at the Cenetaph at the service on Rememberance Sunday.

rejection.details: The claims in this petition are incorrect.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
